title: Giant Two Headed Bear
content:
Giant Two Headed Bear is a Boss monster. Slain during Main Story to get access to the Glowing Bee Hive to extract Glowing Honey.

Note. The model takes two blocks of space; you can "safespot" the boss monster by standing at the far end of the narrow cave entrance on the west side of the map. This is a good opportunity to drink potions, avoid his slam attack and return when you can. The southern most tile of the bridge can also be used.
